title: How to Change Usernames on Roblox

steps.headline: Log in to Roblox.
steps.description: If you're on a computer, go to https://www.roblox.com, enter your username and password, and then tap Log In. If you're on your phone or tablet, open the Roblox app (the black and silver diamond icon) on your home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.headline:
Click the gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":445,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":735.483870967742,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of a Windows icon.\n<\/p>

License: Public Domain<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"} icon.
steps.description: It's at the top-right corner of the page. This will open a menu. If you're using the Roblox app on an Android, iPhone, or iPad, you may have to click three dots instead.

steps.headline: Click Settings on the menu.
steps.description: This will take you to the "Account Info" section of your settings.

steps.headline: Click the Edit icon next to your username.
steps.description: Your username is at the top of the page, and the Edit icon is to its right. It looks like a square with a pencil on top of it. You must have 1000 Robux to change your username. If you don't have enough Robux, you'll see a pop-up that says "Insufficient Funds." Click Buy if you want to buy some Robux, and then follow the on-screen instructions to pay. If you haven't already linked an email address to Roblox, you'll see a pop-up message telling you to do so now. Click Add Email if you see it, and then follow the on-screen instructions to add your email address.

steps.headline: Type your new username and confirm your password.
steps.description: If you have enough Robux in your account, you'll be able to enter your new username and confirm your password now. Other players will still be able to see your old username. Don't choose a name you regret. It's expensive!

steps.headline: Click Buy for 1,000 Robux to confirm your new username.
steps.description: Once you've paid for your new username with Robux, you'll be able to sign in with it. Use the same password you've been using to sign in.

text:
Log in to Roblox. If you're on a computer, go to https://www.roblox.com, enter your username and password, and then tap Log In. If you're on your phone or tablet, open the Roblox app (the black and silver diamond icon) on your home screen or in the app drawer. Click the gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":445,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":735.483870967742,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of a Windows icon.\n<\/p>

License: Public Domain<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"} icon. It's at the top-right corner of the page. This will open a menu. If you're using the Roblox app on an Android, iPhone, or iPad, you may have to click three dots instead. Click Settings on the menu. This will take you to the "Account Info" section of your settings. Click the Edit icon next to your username. Your username is at the top of the page, and the Edit icon is to its right. It looks like a square with a pencil on top of it. You must have 1000 Robux to change your username. If you don't have enough Robux, you'll see a pop-up that says "Insufficient Funds." Click Buy if you want to buy some Robux, and then follow the on-screen instructions to pay. If you haven't already linked an email address to Roblox, you'll see a pop-up message telling you to do so now. Click Add Email if you see it, and then follow the on-screen instructions to add your email address. Type your new username and confirm your password. If you have enough Robux in your account, you'll be able to enter your new username and confirm your password now. Other players will still be able to see your old username. Don't choose a name you regret. It's expensive! Click Buy for 1,000 Robux to confirm your new username. Once you've paid for your new username with Robux, you'll be able to sign in with it. Use the same password you've been using to sign in.
